page.title: 17KILNHURST POST OFFICE
page.content: {The Post Office}in{Kilnhurst Village is about one hundred years old. There is a{postmaster}and his wife who sell sweets, greetings cards and a few groceries as well as stamps, the {postal service}and{National Girobank. There is a new glass screen above the counter containing three layers of shatterproof glass. There is a post collection three times a day. The Post Office serves the people in Kilnhurst Village. There is also a post office in the Highthorn/Meadow View area. Kilnhurst Post Office has an old shop counter and old fashioned shelves which were probably used many years ago as it was once a sorting office too. The Post Office has been an essential part of the village life for many years.
